name: A Lot of Dead Space
description:
Very fun and addictive! A Lot Of Dead Space is easily the most cheerful and heart-warming version of hell that you ever find in AppStore with many awesome features!

  • Work as a game developer for the Lord of Hell himself – and make him proud of your work!
  • Enjoy optimistic and really sweet environment!
  • And let your CREATIVITY to finally break free in a world of A Lot Of Dead Space!

Your ultimate goal is to create the best mobile game interface ever and to have TONS of fun while doing it! Join the team of the most creative producers and developers lead by The Boss!

Wish you were here!

Sounds from : www.zapsplat.com/
Arwork by:  www.youtube.com/user/WermoongRey
